Title: Authorizes the department of environmental conservation to independently add to the lists of prohibited and regulated invasive species on an emergency basis
Summary: Authorizes the department of environmental conservation to independently add to the lists of prohibited and regulated invasive species on an emergency basis pending review by the department of agriculture and markets in consultation with the New York invasive species council.
LawCode: Amd ยง9-1709, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to authorizing the department of environmental conservation to independently add to the lists of prohibited and regulated invasive species on an emergency basis
